idea-plugin.name: Base16 Gruber
idea-plugin.vendor: Patel, Nimai <nimai.m.patel@gmail.com>, colors from www.github.com/rexim/gruber-darker-theme, Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Gruber for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Patel, Nimai <nimai.m.patel@gmail.com>, colors from www.github.com/rexim/gruber-darker-theme. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
